text: Maybe the only threat to a halfling that might make them fight harder is a threat to their food.
Who doesn't fight also doesn't eat!
Nothing like a snack mid-battle to re-invigourate a halfling!
If we can't save the food, then why are we even fighting?
Not as dangerous as the breath of an adult, but it is still advised to avoid being its target.
Strange food make strong, eat lots get impressive gut! Taste like dead plague rat though! - Unknown Ogre Mercenary
Frenzied, crazed cooks (they've been at the 'spicy dumplings' again!) jump out of the cooks' formation whirling their heavy cookpots around.
Frenzied, crazed cooks (they've been at the 'spicy dumplings' again!) jump out of the cooks' formation whirling their heavy cookpots around.
Sheep dogs are perfect for managing large herds of livestock.
Doesn't matter if you're a Halfling, an Ogre or something else, the promise of good grub is worth fighting for.
Halflings have a knack for dodging blows before pin-pointing exposed armour and thrusting their blade.
This halfling has mastered the arts of deception and distraction.
The gunner of the half-tank schloshes soup around the tank, scalding all enemies who get too close. What can men do against such reckless taste?
Shoot faster, we have plenty more where that came from!
Sobering up Aragand might not always be the best idea, but you might learn a thing or two about him...
Heavy drinking leads to a heavy toll, withdrawal. It is inevitable that Aragand will return to the bottle, but for now, heroic deeds await!
Just a sip, just one drop, just to dull the pain...
A Bladesinger’s dance may start as a mesmerising, graceful pirouette, but always ends as a violent maelstrom of slicing, gashing slaughter!
What beauty and violence there is in the dance? A flurry of blades and a certain savagery of intent...
The wending and twisting of the Wardancers hardens their spirits and their bodies against would-be attackers.
The Wardancer threads and loops, contorting to create an ethereal fabric that turns aside arrows and bolts.
Legles's friendship comes with some benefits.
Giblit would very much like to see tomorrow.
[[col:red]][[img:icon_arrow_down]][[/img]] Sobriety causes health loss over time[[/col]]
Maybe the only threat to a halfling that might make them fight harder is a threat to their food.
Who doesn't fight also doesn't eat!
Nothing like a snack mid-battle to re-invigourate a halfling!
If we can't save the food, then why are we even fighting?
Not as dangerous as the breath of an adult, but it is still advised to avoid being its target.
Shoot faster, we have plenty more where that came from!
Get your broken weapons fixed, your armour upgraded or your hat patched.
The tactical burning of special tobacco obscures the unit and its allies, making them harder to hit with missiles. It also temporarily numbs the pain of warriors in range.
“A good story, you don't really write. It was always there. You just uncover it.”
Through his perseverance and determination, Glibfoot's tall tales have now become a reality, and as such he now inspires the Halflings following him to deeds of legend.

No one is quite sure of how a Halfling adventurer has gotten his hands onto a Druchii Repeater Crossbow, and what's even stranger, the weapon is enchanted with the White Wind of Magic. Could any of Glibfoot's braggadocious tales be actually true?

Glibfoot claims that the High Elves of Ulthuan gifted him this small magical blade as thanks for single-handedly defeating a Greenskin invasion of the Asur Homeland. In reality, it is a trinket "borrowed" from the chambers of an Elven Archmage, an enchanted letter opener with the ability to magically "open" almost anything... armour included.
So long as the Master Chef is out of combat, he will keep cooking revitalising food for his fellow Halflings.
A little bit of Rhya’s fancy
The Rumster Clan of Halflings are known to make anything put in a pie taste good... even each other
One of the longshanks brought these mean little buggers from Lustria... Why don't you have a taste?
So you want to get my food? WELL, CHOKE ON IT!
So far behind, and yet how easily the memories and smells of home spring to mind.

It is said that the Hearth of Esmeralda holds an eternal vessel, inside of which a stew has cooked since time immemorial. Those who fall inside the pot will eventually lose themselves to an empyrean piquancy and a transmundane mouthfeel.

It is said that the Hearth of Esmeralda holds an eternal vessel, inside of which a stew has cooked since time immemorial. Those who fall inside the pot will eventually lose themselves to an empyrean piquancy and a transmundane mouthfeel.
Call upon a manifestation of Phineas Fullpouch, patron of tobacco smokers, to huff and puff your enemies away!
Call upon a manifestation of Phineas Fullpouch, patron of tobacco smokers, to huff and puff your enemies away!
Josias the Farmer can provide five of the seven recommended servings of fruits and vegetables. Not locally sourced, but certainly locally applied.
Josias the Farmer can provide five of the seven recommended servings of fruits and vegetables. Not locally sourced, but certainly locally applied.

A simultaneous prayer to both Gaffey the Builder and Josias the Farmer can result in the appearance of a dimensional barndoor, likely linked to a stable somewhere in the Aver March, where husbandry is an art.

A simultaneous prayer to both Gaffey the Builder and Josias the Farmer can result in the appearance of a dimensional barndoor, likely linked to a stable somewhere in the Aver March, where husbandry is an art.
Pies can be thought of as a divine manifestation of Esmeralda. Any foe of the Moot that finds themself baked inside one won't last long, one way or the other...
Pies can be thought of as a divine manifestation of Esmeralda. Any foe of the Moot that finds themself baked inside one won't last long, one way or the other...
Quinsberry, the halfling god of ancestry and tradition, grants each ally a tailor-made vision of their lineage, bolstering their resolve in combat.
Quinsberry, the halfling god of ancestry and tradition, grants each ally a tailor-made vision of their lineage, bolstering their resolve in combat.
[[col:green]][[img:icon_arrow_up]][[/img]] Allied units in combat with target will heal overtime, tasty![[/col]]
